# Self-Report Evaluation (intensive)

Daily for 28 days after clinical evaluation, 4 times a day

```{r}
self_report_evaluation <- read_excel(
  here("data/ema_variables.xlsx"),
  sheet = "self_report_evaluation")

n_cols <- ncol(self_report_evaluation)

self_report_evaluation |> 
kbl(align  = rep("c", n_cols)) |>
     column_spec(3,extra_css = "font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle;") |>
     column_spec(setdiff(1:n_cols, 3), extra_css = "vertical-align: middle;")
```

# Parent-Report Evaluation (intensive)

Daily for 28 days after clinical evaluation, 2 times a day

```{r}
parent_report_evaluation <- read_excel(
  here("data/ema_variables.xlsx"),
  sheet = "parent_report_evaluation",
)

n_cols <- ncol(parent_report_evaluation)

parent_report_evaluation |> 
kbl(align  = rep("c", n_cols)) |>
     column_spec(3,extra_css = "font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle;") |>
     column_spec(setdiff(1:n_cols, 3), extra_css = "vertical-align: middle;")
```
